member.name: T:Griffin.Container.DomainEvents.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Small domain event implementation which uses the inverson of control container for the events.

member.name: T:Griffin.Container.Commands.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Command handling
member.remarks:
Commands should be treated as asynchronous, even if the default implementation is synchronous. That means that the commands should not return any values. You already got all information and should treat every command as they where successful. i.e. append the information to the UI.
If you need IDs, generate them first and then invoke the command.

member.name: T:Griffin.Container.Commands.ExceptionDecorator`1
member.summary: Decorates all commands to allow you to log all exceptions.

member.name: T:Griffin.Container.Commands.IHandlerOf`1
member.summary: Used to handle comands.
member.typeparam: Type of command which is handled
member.remarks: Don't let a class implement several handlers. Keep the classes simple with a single responsibility. It allows you to decorate the handlers and control common tasks like exception logging (together with all command parameters).

member.name: T:Griffin.Container.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Welcome to the Griffin.Container library.

remarks.para:
You need to complete three steps to use the container.
Create a new and register all services
Create a new to build the container
Build the container by invoking
